Container.Name: Tonido
Container.Description: Tonido Server allows you to access all your files on your computer from a web browser, smartphone, tablet or even DLNA enabled devices. No setup necessary.[br] You get an easy to remember link to your computer. e.g.: http://john.tonidoID.com. [br] [br] See http://www.tonido.com for details [br] [b]The WebUI is accessible through http://IPADDRESS:10001[br]
Container.Overview: Tonido Server allows you to access all your files on your computer from a web browser, smartphone, tablet or even DLNA enabled devices. No setup necessary.
